耝字的基本解释

耝
qù
翻松土壤。
古地名。在今中国河南省滑县。

耝
chú
古同“耡”。

耝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chú］
［《集韻》牀魚切，平魚，崇。］
亦作“刞1”。同“鋤1”。
[②]［qù］
［《集韻》七慮切，去御，清。］
古国名。在今河南省滑县东。

耝字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【耒字部】　耝； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页963第09
【集韻】七慮切，音覻。耕而土起謂之耝。　又地名。【路史】耝，羿邑，澶之衞南縣東十五里有故耝城。又【集韻】牀魚切。同鉏，起民令相佐助也。

耝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
耝字的起名意思

暂无。

Cypress
Basic explanation of words
Cypress
qù
Loosen the soil.
Ancient place names. In today's Huaxian County, Henan Province, China.
Cypress
chú
Gu Tong "hoe".
Cypress
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chú]
["Jiyun" bed fish cut, flat fish, Chong. ]
Also known as "刞1". Same as "hoe 1".
[②]［qù］
["Ji Yun" seven considerations cut, go to imperial, clear. ]
Ancient country name. In the east of Huaxian County, Henan Province today.
Cypress
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Lei Character Department] 　耝; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 963 No. 09
[Jiyun] Seven considerations cut, sound 覻. Plowing and soil began to be called "Central".　Also place name. [Road History] Qi, Yiyi, Weinan County, Changzhi County, there is a historic city. Also 【Jiyun】Cut fish on the bed. With the same 鉏, the people order to help each other.
